title: Lyse Doucet: This is an extraordinary moment Iran has been preparing for
summary_full: The killing of the supreme leader will be a huge jolt to the Islamic Republic, which will try hard to show it has a plan in place.
summary_public: The killing of the supreme leader will be a huge jolt to the Islamic Republic, which will try hard to show it has a plan in place.
